title: PANTHEON!
body:
I actually drew this like 3 years ago, but thought I deleted it. Found it going through some old folders.

http://i.imgur.com/Z6zlB68.jpg

Edit: I did this with Adobe Ideas and my finger.

replies.body:
Arcade pantheon..? 

RIOT PLEASE. I LOVE PANTHEON AND I LOVE COLORS. LET THEM DIE TO MY RAINBOW SPEARS.

Ults in... twinkly stars crash from the sky. BOOOM!! rainbow dust cloud. Star spear from the center, leaving little twinkles in its wake. Out of the dust, Mantheon pounces on his victim(s) and realeases a flurry of star spangled justice.
I love rainbow pride concepts. Just funny as hell.

Everything about this is fantastic. I can see it now. Trailing a rainbow out of his butt, he ults in, his star-tipped rainbow spear hurdling through an enemy champion after landing. 

Mantheon has arrived. Fabulously.
Seriously, you just brightened up my monday! <3
Finally a companion piece to the rainbow pony. Great job!
